item.title: Chinese Kinship Calculator
item.description: This is a tool that can flexibly calculate the kinship between Chinese relatives, very practical. Entrance Click here to enter the Chinese Kinship Calculator Tool URL： (Copy) If you encounter problems in the use process, please ask questions in the comment area!

item.title: China Administrative Division Data Query Tool
item.description: This is a tool used to query the relevant content of China’s administrative divisions. In addition, the ID card number resolution tool is built-in. Entrance Click to enter the China Administrative Division Data Query Tool Tool URL： (Copy) If you encounter problems in the use process, please ask questions in the comment area!

item.title: When I whisk away dusts in my childhood...
item.description: 照片信息 This photo was taken near the Binhai Road in Dalian China in 2011. The shooting time is 14:15 on May 1, UTC+8. I photoshopped it and made A PPT report. About the PPT Review online Because the preview is blurred and the sound effect and font are lost, it is recommended to watch it after downloading.Click to DOWNLOAD After downloading This PPT is produced by Microsoft Office PowerPoint. Please use Microsoft Office PowerPoint (Windows, Android, iOS) app to open it.

item.title: Hello World🎉
item.description: My first blog. This is the first blog I published on my personal site. I mainly share my thoughts on blogs and exchange technology. From now on, I will record my thoughts and bring help and good feelings to everyone. How is this site made? My personal site was created by Github’s personal static page hosting service and Hugo, a static page building tool. For more information, please search the following keywords on google: GitHub pages Hugo My Heart Will Go On, by Celine Dion (Test Text) Every night in my dreams

item.title: Dalian ∩ Japan
item.description: 描述： The historical intersection between Dalian and Japan is recorded here. Read page 1: The Evolution of Place Names in Dalian >
